nodes.bodyText: Could you please add access modifier?
Cleanup please
Why we need such import?
Why we need UserManager real bean?
Let's remove empty lines between fields.
Also, cold you please place fields autowired fields declaration?
Let's create a new build method in creators package. This  method may accept id, name, owner arguments.
Let's not confuse packages: PipelineRun is not in cluster package. We need to create a new package/class for PipelineRun object creating methods.
The same for creators below
Let's  inline test class field initiliazations and get rid of setUp method.
Do not forget final please
Could we use contains method here?
Looks like this field was not initialized
Could you please add final to fields here and in other places?
The private methods shell be after all public methods
It seems that we can just use basePackages = {"com.epam.pipeline.security.acl", "com.epam.pipeline.manager.security"}
Could you please rename this class to ClusterCreatorUtils? This class should consist of creators for entities from cluster package.
Could you move this method to ClusterCreatorUtils?
It is absolutely not clear what is meant permission

nodes.bodyText: Let's avoid some test case specific naming in such classes. For example, for current situation we need only one method  for this class - getPipelineRun that will return PipelineRun object and accepts all required argument: id, name, owner... You may take the ObjectCreatorUtils class as a basis.

nodes.bodyText: see PipelineCreatorUtils comment
Do not forget to make variables final
It seems this initialization is redundant.
Format code please

It seems for such simple and short cases we can merge these two lines:
assertThat(clusterApiService.getNodes()).hasSize(1).contains(nodeInstance);
Could you check it for other methods too?
Maybe we shell consider creating a common for *ApiServiceTest classes method to build a single user permissions?
Looks like this initialization is redundant
Could you check it for other methods too?

Maybe we shell add @AclMask tests? (for merging entity permissions with parent permissions)
P.S.: see AclAspect
Could you please check if all of the changes in this class are relevant to the pull request? It seems that mocks like PipelineDao have nothing to do with acl tests.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -17,47 +17,79 @@
 package com.epam.pipeline.test.acl;

nodes.bodyText: I'm afraid that this change can be harmful if some api method has NodeInstance class in request body. For example as part of PipelineRun class. Let's revert the change until we have implemented tests for all the controllers.
Could you please replace the field usages with CommonCreatorConstants.TEST_STRING.
I already have four static imports in this class, and, if i'm not mistaken, PMD avoid amount of static imports more than four.
I suppose we can call the second one just anotherNodeInstance.
Let's specify explicitly why the access is denied like shouldDenyAccessToNodeWhenPermissionIsNotGranted.
Could you please use generic type to return List<T> rather then List<Object>. It probably is a good idea because it increases the possibility that this method will be reused.

It does look like we can just replace it with the new method mockNode. Some similar cases with terminateNode calls in different tests too. You can just add terminateNode to mockNode and everything seems to be just fine.
